declarations.description: Component representing a DOM cell of the Apex grid.
declarations.name: ApexGridCell

members.name: value
members.description: The value which will be rendered by the component.

members.name: column
members.description: A reference to the column configuration object.

members.name: active
members.description: Indicates whether this is the active cell in the grid.

members.name: row
members.description: The parent row component holding this cell.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Indicates whether this is the active cell in the grid.

declarations.description:
Apex grid is a web component for displaying data in a tabular format quick and easy.

Out of the box it provides row virtualization, sort and filter operations (client and server side),
the ability to template cells and headers and column hiding.
declarations.name: ApexGrid

members.name: columns
members.description: Column configuration for the grid.

members.name: data
members.description: The data source for the grid.

members.name: autoGenerate
members.description:
Whether the grid will try to "resolve" its column configuration based on the passed
data source.

members.name: sortConfiguration
members.description: Sort configuration property for the grid.

members.name: dataPipelineConfiguration
members.description: Configuration object which controls remote data operations for the grid.

members.name: sortExpressions
members.description: Get the sort state for the grid.

members.name: filterExpressions
members.description: Get the filter state for the grid.

members.name: rows
members.description: Returns the collection of rendered row elements in the grid.

members.name: dataView
members.description:
Returns the state of the data source after sort/filter operations
have been applied.

members.name: totalItems
members.description: The total number of items in the ApexGrid.dataView collection.

members.name: filter
members.description: Performs a filter operation in the grid based on the passed expression(s).

members.name: sort
members.description: Performs a sort operation in the grid based on the passed expression(s).

members.name: clearSort
members.description: Resets the current sort state of the control.

members.name: clearFilter
members.description: Resets the current filter state of the control.

members.name: getColumn
members.description: Returns a ColumnConfiguration for a given column.

members.name: updateColumns
members.description: Updates the column configuration of the grid.

events.description: Emitted when sorting is initiated through the UI.
events.name: sorting

events.description: Emitted when a sort operation initiated through the UI has completed.
events.name: sorted

events.description: Emitted when filtering is initiated through the UI.
events.name: filtering

events.description: Emitted when a filter operation initiated through the UI has completed.
events.name: filtered

attributes.name: auto-generate
attributes.description:
Whether the grid will try to "resolve" its column configuration based on the passed
data source.

declarations.description: Component representing the DOM row in the Apex grid.
declarations.name: ApexGridRow

members.name: handlers
start
members.description: Begins resizing a column by showing and positioning the resize indicator in relation to the column.

members.name: stop
members.description: Stops and resets the resizing state.

members.name: renderIndicator
members.description: Renders the resize indicator in the grid.
